text: Alexander Bublik was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Dennis Novikov won the title after defeating Christian Garín 6–4, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Morelos Open - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 Morelos Open – Singles
